Dear Mr, Skornia:
This is to inform you that Clarence Flick has
accepted a position on the staff of San Jose
State College in California. I am sure he will
appreciate it if you address his mail to be sent
there.
Sincerely,
Howard S. Martin
Director, Radio-T.V. Section
Department of Speech
University of Nebraska
